document.full_text: mr. marion, known as the octopus for his long arms and ability to gobble up ground balls, was an all-star every season from 1943 to 1950.
document.title: marty marion, cardinals's slick-fielding shortstop, dies at 93
lines_and_colors: mr. marion, known as the octopus for his long arms and ability to gobble up ground balls, was an all-star every season from 1943 to 1950.
